name: Autumn Breeze Ankle Length Convertible TuTu Dress
description:
This design is perfect for Fall photo shoots!! 

Wear it to the pumpkin patch or apple picking as well.

The Autumn Breeze Ankle length TuTu has very whimsical chocolate and copper tones. Finished off with beautiful accent leaves on top and a chocolate and gold satin halter.

Piece "GROWS" with child and converts from full length dress to flowing skirt as child grows!

Due to the custom nature of this piece, please be sure to include exact measurements when placing your order. * TuTu length in inches (under arm to ankle measurement)

name: Tangled Halloween Costume
description:
Tangled is the modern version of Rapunzel.

This is our modern and sophisticated twist on this classic tale!

This full length handmade gown is constructed of the highest quality tulle in a complimentary light shade of Pansy. 

Thin strands of baby pink organza ribbon run through all sides of this design, which is accented on a dark lavendar crochet top. Wide baby pink organza ribbon laces up the front for the classic Tangled gown look. More thin strands of baby pink organza weave around both shoulder straps. Each shoulder strap is accented with a pink organza bow and pink pearl center.

As this piece is a couture handmade costume, please specify exact measurement from under arm to ankle length prior to checkout. Ships from United States

name: Cupcake TuTu
description:
This TuTu is near and dear to our hearts as it was designed by the winner of our 1000 FB fan Custom Designed TuTu Giveaway on our blog www.chloestutusweetshoppe.blogspot.com

The winner of our Custom Designed TuTu Giveaway chose her unique blend of Beauty Hot Pink, Aqua,and Rosette Baby Pink!

All of our designs are handmade with the highest quality tulle and come with a coordinating ribbon at the waist.

TUTU SIZING

6m to 9m  :  6"-7" length, 15"-16" waist

9m to 12m  : 7" length, 16"-17" waist

12m to 24m  : 7"-8" length, 17"-18" waist

2 to 3 yr  : 8" length, 18"-19" waist

4yr :  8"-9" length,  20" waist

4yr to 5yr  :  9" length, 20"-21" waist

WWW.CHLOESTUTUSWEETSHOPPE.COM
